name: Lorem_fixedStringTest
description: Unit tests for the fixedString method in the Lorem class.

test_cases.name: testFixedStringWithZeroLength
test_cases.description: Tests the fixedString method with a length of zero.

test_cases.name: testFixedStringWithPositiveLength
test_cases.description: Tests the fixedString method with a positive length.

test_cases.name: testFixedStringWithNegativeLength
test_cases.description: Tests the fixedString method with a negative length.

test_cases.name: testFixedStringWithLengthGreaterThanSentence
test_cases.description: Tests the fixedString method with a length greater than a sentence.
